0010101011110010 0111010011011010 0 -> sum: 1001111111001100, cout: 0

1110111110110000 1100101100001011 0 -> sum: 1011101010111011, cout: 1
1111001010111111 1100011010110011 1 -> sum: 1011100101110011, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
